info.title: Docomono API
info.description: We provide photo collection API just to enable the customer to save his memories on the cloud based storage system and we provide character recognition API in order to recognize the characters that appear with an image, etc. You can choose the APIs that best match your service concept to start developing innovate apps.

get.description: This API enables you to get IDs of your friends who allow you to view their information through Friend Notification Settings.*IDs you can get are only those of your friends linked to the service (client_id) to which you are also linked.*In case end-user has many number of Tsunagari information, it may take long time to get API response.

parameters.name: Date
parameters.description: Text indicating that a date.The letters, will depend on the format.format = y / m  / dcan be specified character, single-byte numbers only.format = ym / my  / md / dm / ymd / dmy / mdyPossible characters, half-width numbers and single-byte symbol / (shaded / slash) ·  - (minus / hyphen) only.Sample value) <say-as interpret-as = date format = ymd> 2012/04/05 </ say-as>

parameters.name: Telephone
parameters.description: Text indicating that a telephone number.For possible character, single-byte numbers and byte symbols ( (left parenthesis) ) (right parenthesis), - (minus / hyphen) -  (space / blank) only.

parameters.name: Time
parameters.description: Indicating that text is time.The letters, will depend on the format.The [AMPM specified] here, it refers to the half-width of the am / pm / AM /it to describe a string of PM at the beginning or end of the text.This is, am ( pm )and if it is specified, AMR (pm), AM ( PM )if it had been specified is the instructions read aloud as morning (afternoon). .format = h12can be specified character is, only and half the number AMPM specified.format = h / m  / scan be specified character, single-byte numbers only.format = hm / ms  / hmsPossible characters, half-width numbers and single-byte symbol : (colon), - only (minus / hyphen).format = hm12 / hms12 for possible character, single-byte numbers and single-byte symbol : (colon), - (minus / hyphen) and only AMPM specified.Sample value) <say-as interpret-as = time format = hm12> AM12: 34 </ say-as>

parameters.name: Break
parameters.description: Pause or empty element to control the prosody of the boundaries between other tokens.The <break> element, can not be anything including.Sample value)yawing<break time = 3000ms / >Don

parameters.name: P
parameters.description: Element representing a paragraph.Immediately before and after this element will be the end of a sentence treat.The <p> element, text and <break>, <p>, <phoneme>, <prosody>, <say-as>, <sub>, <s>, <token>, <voice>, <w>It may include only the elements.Sample value) <p> good morning </ p> <p> night </ p>

parameters.name: Phoneme
parameters.description: Elements that grant the pronunciation on the phoneme / pronunciation to the text.The <phoneme> element can contain only text.It may be empty.

parameters.name: Prosody
parameters.description: Audio output of the pitch (height), reading speed (speech speed), elements that perform, such as control of volume.The <prosody> element, text and <break>, <p>, <phoneme>, <prosody>, <say-as>, <sub>, <s>, <token>, <voice>, <w>It may include only the elements.Sample value)<Prosody Rate = 0.8><Prosody Pitch = 1.3> er </ Prosody><Prosody Pitch = 1.4 Volume = 1.2> only over over </ Prosody><Prosody Pitch = 1.5 volume = 0.6> and over over </ Prosody><Prosody Pitch = 1.6 Volume = 1.1> Su - over </ Prosody></ Prosody>

parameters.name: S
parameters.description: Element that represents a statement.Can not be inserted into the end of a sentence symbol is within the scope of this element, immediately before and after the element is the end of a sentence treat.The <s> element, text and <break>, <phoneme>, <say-as>, <sub>, <token>,can contain only elements of <w>.Sample value) <s> Hello </ s> <s> Goodbye </ s>

parameters.name: Say-as
parameters.description: Element that shows information about the type of text constructs in the element.This element serves to specify the level of detail of the descriptive text can provide reading how tips.The <say-as> element may include only specific text.

parameters.name: Speak
parameters.description: SSML root element.The <speak> element, text and <break>, <p>, <phoneme>, <prosody>, <say-as>, <sub>, <s>, <token>, <voice>, <w>It may include only the elements.

parameters.name: Sub
parameters.description: Elements indicating that to be replaced the text to another text.This element can include a text description format, both text for speech.The <sub> element can contain only text.

parameters.name: Token
parameters.description: <token The> elements that represent the token.<w> element of <token> element alias.This element, indicates that this content is talk, it is possible to remove the ambiguity of the separator of token (word).The <token The> element can contain only text.Sample value) <token> Tokyo </ token> <w> patent </ w> <w> Allow </ w>

parameters.name: Voice
parameters.description: Element to request the change of text-to-speech.<voice> The elements, text and <break>, <p>, <phoneme>, <prosody>, <say-as>, <sub>, <s>, <token>, <voice>, <w>It may include only the elements.Sample value) <voice name = nozomi >Hello </ voice>

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: MIME type of the received data, specify one of the following.audio / L16: return the voice data (Binary).application / x-aitalk-kana: intermediate language (AI Kana)u203b 2return in a text.text / x-jeita-6004- kana: JEITAKanau203b 3return in a text.u203b For more information about the article in the intermediate language (AI Kana), hereinquiryPlease request a specification from.

parameters.description: To use the app authentication of access to the API.

parameters.name: Audiodata
parameters.description: In the Accept request header, return if you specify the audio / L16.As format of the following audio data.[Encoding]linear PCM[number of channels]1 (monaural)[sample frequency]16000[bit depth]16bit (big-endian)

parameters.name: Content-Length
parameters.description: It specifies the length of the request body (in byte).

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: MIME type of the transmitted data, specify the following.application / ssml + xml: Japanese SSML format

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Specify attribute the format of the specified content in the interpret-as.

parameters.name: Intermediatelanguage(AIKana)
parameters.description: In the Accept request header, if you specify the application / x-aitalk-kana, return the intermediate language (AI Kana).u203b For more information about the article in the intermediate language (AI Kana), hereinquiryPlease request a specification from.

parameters.name: JEITACana
parameters.description: If you specify a text / x-jeita-6004-kana in the Accept request header, return the JEITA Cana.

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: Attributes that control the pitch range to read aloud the text.The reference value is 1.0, it can be specified in the range of 0.00 to 2.00 (can be specified point to the second place).

parameters.name: rate
parameters.description: Attributes that control the rate at which read aloud the text.The reference value is 1.0, it can be specified in the range of 0.50 to 4.00 (can be specified point to the second place).

parameters.name: transfer-encoding
parameters.description: If you specify the audio / L16 in the Accept request header, return the following.Chunked

parameters.name: volume
parameters.description: Attributes that control the volume to read aloud the text.The reference value is 1.0, it can be specified in the range of 0.00 to 2.00 (can be specified point to the second place).

put.description: Upload partitioned contents with UploadID.Specifies the Upload ID obtained by uploading of GSCT info. and obtaining UploadID, then sends a chunk by PUT. Chunks are sent in the binary format. The size is specified by using the content-range header.

parameters.description: OAuth authentication scheme.Seespecificationu300cu5171u901au898fu5b9a 2u300d (Common Specifications 2).

parameters.name: content-range
parameters.description: Range of data to be sent (See RFC2616 for the format).

parameters.name: if-match
parameters.description: Value specified in X-kii-ckient-hash at issuance of Upload ID.

parameters.name: X-kii-appid
parameters.description: Fixed value DOCOMO

parameters.name: X-kii-appkey
parameters.description: Fixed value DOCOMO

parameters.name: {uploadID}
parameters.description: Upload IDs issued by the server.

[Train]? (To the time) <to the Eki>nYou specify these as follows.n viaList = departure station: arrival station & fixedTrainList = train & fixedTimeList = departure time: arrival time & fixedDateList = departure date (service day)nFor station code and station namenYou can use the station code or station name as the data that identifies the station, but if you want to use as a premise to save is recommended to station code. Station name might be changed in the station name was renamed, etc., but brute string to the station name, station code is a constant regardless of the change of station name.n

nBetween the specified station or point, and search for a route using public transportation. Search by the average waiting time and, search by the diamond (departure time search, etc.) can be done.nSearch by the average waiting timenTaking into account the average waiting time of the train you do a search for a route. The average waiting time is, thats flying has been set in about 20 minutes, even if there is only one flight per day, it does not match the actual waiting time. In addition, with regard to the comprehensive coverage that operate by day of the week, we try to search for a route to ignore the departure date.nInter u30a4 Yakult ni yo ru Exploration (Requested Procedure time to explore, the time to explore, and finally electrical exploration, beginning to explore Requested Procedure)nFrom diamond timetable,nnDeparture time search, early arrival and late departure routenRoute arrival time search is to arrive early and late departurenRoute last train search, to arrive at the final diamond of departure / arrival date (until the next day at 3 am)nRoute first train search, to the earliest arriving starting to departure / arrival datennIt will search each.nResult route may not exist as (have to suppress the use of the airplane in the search to the airport, the route can not be created in a fixed route, etc.), an empty result is returned instead of the error.nFor station code and station namenYou can use the station code or station name as the data that identifies the station, but if you want to use as a premise to save is recommended to station code. Station name might be changed in the station name was renamed, etc., but brute string to the station name, station code is a constant regardless of the change of station name.n
